HOW TO PLAY REVERSI:
1. OBJECTIVE Have the majority of pieces showing your color when the game ends.
2. GETTING STARTED - Black always moves first - Players take turns placing one piece per turn - The game starts with 2 black and 2 white pieces in the center
3. MAKING A MOVE Place your piece so that it \"sandwiches\" one or more opponent pieces between your new piece and another piece of your color.
A \"sandwich\" occurs when your pieces bracket opponent pieces in a straight line (horizontal, vertical, or diagonal).
4. FLIPPING PIECES All sandwiched opponent pieces are flipped to your color.
5. VALID MOVES You must make a valid sandwich. If you cannot make a valid move, you must pass your turn.
6. GAME END The game ends when: - The board is completely full - Neither player can make a valid move
The player with the most pieces of their color wins!
TIPS: - Corner pieces are very valuable - they cannot be flipped - Avoid positions next to corners (X-squares) early in the game - Think ahead and control the edges of the board
